Rich Stretanski

Recent University of Michigan-Dearborn Graduate

Masters of Science: Information Systems & Technology

BBA: Digital Marketing & Information Technology Management (Dual Major)

Welcome to My Website!

I am a recent graduate from the University of Michigan: Dearborn. I graduated from the College of Business where I dual majored in Information Technology Management, and Digital Marketing. I got my master's degree in Information Systems & Technology (Information Security concentration) from the College of Engineering & Computer Science.

While taking classes, I worked as an Applications Engineer at a small company, where, due to the company size, I used my wide-ranging academic background to handle network administration tasks like setting up VPN infrastructure for developers overseas, I build demos of our knowledge system tailored to prospective clients, and I even ran a google AdWords advertising account.

The purpose of this site is to archive my academic, professional, and personal projects over the years. Since I don't really have a social media presence, It will also serve as a way to get to know me, follow the things I've done, and share in my interests.

Feel free to reach out to me at rstretan@umich.edu
